dialog.label: Cronjob, active
dialog.hint: If you switch off kitCronjob it will no longer execute any cronjob.

dialog.label: Cronjob, key
dialog.hint:
To prevent kitCronjob from a non authorized access, the cronjob.php must be called with the parameter key and the value of this field.
Sample: /modules/kit_cronjob/cronjob.php?key=01234567.

dialog.label: Cronjob, name length
dialog.hint: The minimum length of a name for a cronjob, default is 6 characters.

dialog.label: Protocol, limit
dialog.hint: Limit the max. visible entries of the protocol to the number you enter here, default is 100.

dialog.label: Protocol, show no-load
dialog.hint: If set to No no-load entries will be suppressed in the protocol view.

dialog.label: Protocol, table limit
dialog.hint: Shrink the protocol table to the specified number of entries. This shrink process will be executed if you view the protocol.

dialog.label: PHP exec
dialog.hint: The server path to the executable PHP command interpreter.

dialog.label: Use SSL
dialog.hint: If set to Yes, kitCronjob will try to execute any cronjob using the Secure Socket Layer (HTTPS) protocol instead of the standard protocol (HTTP).

dialog.label: Timezone
dialog.hint: Specify the timezone kitCronjob should use, default is Europe/Berlin.
